Citation commencement and interpretation
These Rules may be cited as the Fund Passporting Rules.
Obligations: Obligation:1 "Register with the ADGM Financial Services Regulatory Authority (FSRA) and notify them of your intention to market or passport your fund across borders or within the ADGM."
Obligation:2 "Ensure that the funds comply with the eligibility criteria for passporting as set out by the ADGM regulations."

Obligation:3 "Provide accurate and complete information to potential investors, including prospectuses, key investor information documents (KIIDs), periodic reports, investment objectives, risks, charges, and expenses."
Obligation:4 "Regularly report to the FSRA on the fund's operations, performance, compliance with the passporting rules, financial statements, and fund performance."

Obligation:5 "Implement investor protection measures, such as maintaining transparency in pricing, fair treatment of investors, handling complaints effectively, and adhering to any investor protection measures part of the passporting rules."
Obligation:6 "Maintain robust risk management processes to identify, manage, and monitor risks."
Obligation:7 "Follow specific guidelines related to the marketing of funds, ensuring promotional materials are not misleading, and adhere to any marketing restrictions within the ADGM."
Obligation:8 "Pay any fees associated with the registration, ongoing supervision, and passporting process."
Obligation:9 "Cooperate with the FSRA and other relevant regulatory bodies, including sharing information and facilitating inspections or investigations."
Obligation:10 "Implement and maintain effective Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Counter-Terrorist Financing (CTF) policies and procedures."
Obligation:11 "Ensure ongoing compliance with the ADGM's regulatory requirements and any changes to the Fund Passporting Rules."
Obligation:12 "Ensure that the fund is compliant with the rules and regulations of its home jurisdiction if different from the ADGM."
